links.name: "Should I tie you to the other steeds?"

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Rip of the bandaid Jesse, just go for it!

[["I don't know if I'm ready."->HesitateMore]]

[["Right!" ->Let'sDoThis!]]
passages.name: hesitate1

passages.text:
Alright... I guess I'll tie you to the other horses?

[[Continue. ->BondageJokePayoff]]
passages.name: bondageJoke

passages.text:
//You can't help but blush.// I'm, eh.. that's not what I meant!

[[Continue. ->HoraceAdvice]]
passages.name: NotWhatIMeant

passages.text:
//You try to play it off your embarassment// "Hah, ehm, yeah... I'm full of surprises!

[[Continue. ->HoraceDoesn'tBuyIt]]
passages.name: PlayingItCool

passages.text:
Maybe... maybe I shouldn't go right in? Can't we walk around a little more?

[[Continue. ->hesitate1]]
passages.name: MaybeIShould

passages.text:
You'r right, let's do this!

[[Continue. ->GoInside]]
passages.name: Let'sDoThis!

passages.text:
//You go into the saloon.//

{SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: GoInside

passages.text:
//Horace chuckles and moves past the tied down steeds towards an open window of the saloon.//

I didn't know you were into that, Jesse.

[["Not what I meant!" ->NotWhatIMeant]]
[["I'm full of surprises!" ->PlayingItCool]]
passages.name: BondageJokePayoff

passages.text:
Oh, they are going to love you in there, Jesse.

[["If you say so." ->IfYouSaySo]]
passages.name: HoraceAdvice

passages.text:
"If you say so. I mean, why wouldn't they?"

[[Go in. ->GoInside]]
passages.name: IfYouSaySo

passages.text:
Yeaaaah. Careful with that, if you act tough, you'll be played rough.

[["I can take it." ->ICanTakeIt]]

[["I'll be careful." ->IWillBeCareful]]
passages.name: HoraceDoesn'tBuyIt

passages.text:
I can take it!

[[Continue. ->HoraceCantBelieve]]
passages.name: ICanTakeIt
HoraceCantBelieve

passages.text:
Alright, I'll be careful.

[[Go in. ->GoInside]]
passages.name: IWillBeCareful

passages.text:
//You look around you. The busy morning street is filled with people, moving purposfully. Everything seems to grow, the sounds, colors, people. You feel very small. Looking at your feet, you are about to turn to Horace, when a tall black-clad cowgirl with two noses leaves the saloon, almost bumping into you. Her hand immediatly moves towards the gun at her hip, but then she seizes you up and smirks, before tipping her hat.//


[[Continue. ->MightyCute]]
passages.name: HesitateMore

passages.text:
//You blush at the attention, but something in her tone sets you off.//

"I'm -not- playing dressup, I'm a cowboy! I can wrangle a buggalo just as well as you!"

[["I'll be the greatest cowboy!"->HOYPE]]

[["And you and your pea-shooter can keep walking!"->Dismiss]]

[[Say nothing else.->CowGirlAnger]]

links.name: "And you and your pea-shooter can keep walking!"

passages.name: protest

passages.text:
//You feel embarrassed and can feel your cheeks getting hot.//

"Uhm, Th-Thank you."


[["I like your hat." ->Appeasement]]

[["But this isn't a costume" ->NotACostume]]

[["Say nothing and hope she goes away." ->SayNothing]]

links.name: "Say nothing and hope she goes away."

passages.name: ThankYou

passages.text:
//The surprised look on her face only fuels your indignation//

And I'm not just any cowboy. My name's Jessie and going to be the greatest cowboy in the history of the world! 

And you better remember my name, because that's the only "Sweetcheeks" I'll let you get away with, you hear?

[[Stare her down.->CowGirlAnger]]

[[Leave her in your dust and walk into the saloon.->GoInPumped]]

links.name: Leave her in your dust and walk into the saloon.

passages.name: HOYPE
Appeasement

passages.text:
It's not a costume though... I'm going to be a cowboy.

[[Continue. ->OnlyCowboysInBed]]
passages.name: NotACostume

passages.text:
//You feel your face flush and say nothing, looking at your feet.//

[[Continue. ->ILikeEmShy]]
passages.name: SayNothing

passages.text:
Listen, Sweetcheeks, you'r lucky my Mom taught me not to hit boys. And you'll soon learn that the only cowboys in this town are found in bed, when I -let- them go for a ride.

[["Continue staring her down." ->StareHerDownV2]]

[["As if anyone wants to ride you!" ->Burnnn]]

[["Yeah, whatever!" You back away. ->BackDown]]

links.name: "As if anyone wants to ride you!"

passages.name: FIGHT

passages.text:
//Feeling like you can take on the whole world, you go into the saloon.//

{SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: GoInPumped

passages.text:
//You keep her gaze, staring her down. The moment feels stretched oput, like a very sticky mass of mashed potatos dripping from a fork.  You manage not to distract yourself with silly thoughts like that, and she breaks eye contact first, spitting to the side and walking past you.//


[["Let out a breath of relief." ->Relief&Horace]]

[["Shout something after her." ->CantLetItGoCanYou]]

[["What a twat, right Horace?" ->WhatATwat]]
passages.name: StareHerDownV2

passages.text:
As if anyone would even want to ride you!

[["With noses like yours, you have to pay for a hug!"->ContinueTaunting]]

[["Not even your dad would give ya' a kiss!" ->ContinueTaunting]]

[["I've seen buggalo with better looks than you!" ->ContinueTaunting]]"

[[Stare her down. ->StareHerDownV2]]

links.name: "With noses like yours, you have to pay for a hug!"
"Not even your dad would give ya' a kiss!"
"I've seen buggalo with better looks than you!"

passages.name: Burnnn
BackDown
Relief&Horace

passages.text:
//You can't keep yourself from turning around and shouting after her.//

"Yeah, you better run, coward!"

[[Go inside the Saloon before she has time to respond. ->GoInPumped]] 

[[Continue. ->PieceOfShit]]

links.name: Go inside the Saloon before she has time to respond.

passages.name: CantLetItGoCanYou

passages.text:
What a twat, right Horace?

[[Continue. ->HoraceTalk]]
passages.name: WhatATwat

passages.text:
You little piece of shit!

[[Continue. ->OhShitGetShot]]
passages.name: PieceOfShit

passages.text:
The end.

{Epilogue}
passages.name: GameOverUnconcsiouss

passages.text:
//Horace looks at you like he sees you for the first time.//

Damn, Jessie! You know who that was, right? That was Frida the Freezer!

[["Ah, eh.. sure!"->PlayItCool]]

[["Oh heck, really?!->OhHeck]]
passages.name: HoraceTalk

links.name: You feel pretty pumped and go inside with a swagger.

passages.name: PlayItCool

links.name: Take a moment to gather yourself, before going inside.

passages.name: OhHeck

passages.text:
//You open your mouth to let another awesome zinger fly, as her right clocks you in the jaw and you stumble down. You taste blood and everything is spinning.//

[[Get up. ->GetUp]]
passages.name: ContinueTaunting

passages.text:
//You get up slowly, leaning on Horace who has moved between you and the Cowgirl. Shaking your head a little to clear the stars, you feel tears in your eyes. You hear Horace and the Cowgirl exchange bad words, before she finally leaves.//

[["Sorry, Horace." ->SorryHorace]]

[["Thank you, Horace."->ThankYouHorace]]

[[Say nothing.->SayNothingPostFight]]
passages.name: GetUp

passages.text:
Sorry, Horace. I..

[[Horace interrupts you. ->NothingToBeSorryFor]]
passages.name: SorryHorace

passages.text:
Thanks, Horace. 

[[Continue. ->NincsMit]]
passages.name: ThankYouHorace

passages.text:
//You say nothing and hide your face behind your hair, leaning against Horace.//

[[Continue. ->HoraceComfortsYou]]
passages.name: SayNothingPostFight

passages.text:
You've got nothing to be sorry for Jessie! That woman was a straight up asshole, you did right to stand up for yourself! Just, maybe next time try not to push it too far. 

Now dust yourself off and get in there, don't let her win!

[[You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside ->GoInPummeled]]

links.name: You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside

passages.name: NothingToBeSorryFor

passages.text:
//Rubbing your bruised cheek, you gather your courage and go into the saloon.//

{SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: GoInPummeled

passages.text:
//She gives you a mean smirk and moves past you, obviously considering herself the victor off this little stand-off.//

[["What a twat, right Horace? ->WhatATwat]] 

[[Shout something after her. ->CantLetItGoCanYou]] 

[[Let her leave and go inside. ->GoInside]]

links.name: Let her leave and go inside.

passages.name: ConsidersItAWin

passages.text:
Don't thank me, Jessie, I should have stepped in sooner. That woman was a straight up asshole. You did right to stand up for yourself! Just, maybe next time try not to push it too far. 

Now dust yourself off and get in there. Can't let her win!

[[You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside ->GoInPummeled]]

links.name: You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside

passages.name: NincsMit

passages.text:
Hey, hey, it's okay. That woman was an asshole, don't let her get to you.
It's a rough town, Jessie. It's good that you stood up for yourself, okay?

[["Maybe it's too rough for me... ->MaybeItsTooRough]]

[["Okay, thank you Horace.->NincsMit2]]
passages.name: HoraceComfortsYou

passages.text:
Maybe it's too rough for me, Horace. I thought I could do this but I'm not sure anymore.

[[Continue. ->HonestHorace]]
passages.name: MaybeItsTooRough

passages.text:
Don't thank me, Jessie, I should have stepped in sooner.

Now dust yourself off and get in there. Can't let her win!

[[You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside ->GoInPummeled]]

links.name: You thank your friend, dust yourself off, and go inside

passages.name: NincsMit2

passages.text:
Look, Jessie, I'll be honest. There are a lot of people like her, and a lot that are worse. I think you've got what it takes, otherwise I wouldn't have agreed to even bring you here, but in the end it's you who has to decide.

[["Thank you Horace. I'll show them."->GoInPummeled]]

[["I don't think I can do this." ->GameOverDiscoruaged]]

links.name: "I don't think I can do this."

passages.name: HonestHorace

passages.text:
//You abandon your dream.//

{Epilogue}
passages.name: GameOverDiscoruaged

passages.text:
And you and your pea-shooter can just keep walking, "Sweetcheeks".

[[Leave her eating your dust and go inside. ->GoInPumped]] 

[[Stare her down. ->StareHerDownV2]]

links.name: Leave her eating your dust and go inside.

passages.name: Dismiss

passages.text:
Aw, pretty boy like you got no reason to be shy with a face. Maybe I'll see you around later, go for a ride, eh?

//She moves past you and you feel the tension leaving your body. It's right back when she pinches your butt. She saunters off laughing.//


[["Hecking heck, I knew I couldn't do this." ->HeckingHeck]]

[[Say nothing. ->HonestHoraceNoFight]]

links.name: "Hecking heck, I knew I couldn't do this."

passages.name: ILikeEmShy
HeckingHeck

passages.text:
//Horace gives you sympathetic udge.//

Aw, Jessie. Look, I'll be honest. There are a lot of people like her, and a lot that are worse. I think you've got what it takes, otherwise I wouldn't have agreed to even bring you here, but in the end it's you who has to decide.

[["Thank you Horace, you'r right. I can do this."->GoInside]]

[["I don't think I can do this." ->GameOverDiscoruaged]]

links.name: "Thank you Horace, you'r right. I can do this."
"I don't think I can do this."

passages.name: HonestHoraceNoFight

passages.text:
And I like yours, sweetcheeks. Though you probably look better without it, or anything for that matter. //She winks at you with a dirty grin.//

[[Say nothing. ->SayNothing]] 

[[Force a giggle. ->AppeasementCont.]]
passages.name: AndILikeYours

passages.text:
Hihi, I guess so.

[[Continue. ->MeetUpLater]]
passages.name: AppeasementCont.

passages.text:
Maybe we meet up later, find out, eh Sweetcheeks? Got to run now though. I've got a room in the Shag, so just ask the bartender for Fridas.

//She winks again, and moves past you, not without pinching your butt though.//

[[Avoid looking Horace in the eye and go inside.->GoInsideAshamed]]

[["Hecking heck, why did I let her do this to me!" ->HeckingHeck]]

links.name: Avoid looking Horace in the eye and go inside.
"Hecking heck, why did I let her do this to me!"

passages.name: MeetUpLater

passages.text:
//Feeling ashamed, you slink into the saloon//

{SceneA2.1 Jessie}
passages.name: GoInsideAshamed

passages.text:
Oh yeah? The only cowboys I ever meet are the ones in bed, when I let 'em go for a ride. 

[[Say nothing. ->SayNothing]] 

[[Giggle a little. ->AppeasementCont.]] 

[["Well, I'm not one of those." ->ProtestWeakly]]
passages.name: OnlyCowboysInBed

passages.text:
Well, I'm not one of those... 

[[Continue. ->MeetUpLater]]
passages.name: ProtestWeakly

passages.text:
Sorry about that sweetcheeks. I like your dressup, you look mighty cute.

[["It's not a dressup, I'm a cowboy!"->protest]]

[["Uhm, thanks."->ThankYou]]

links.name: "It's not a dressup, I'm a cowboy!"

passages.name: MightyCute

passages.text:
//Her faces goes from surprise, to disbelieve, to anger. She steps up to you, building her self up to her full height. You realize she is a bit taller than you and that those muscles probably aren't just for show.//

[[Continue. ->FIGHT]]
passages.name: CowGirlAnger

passages.text:
//She turns around shouting at you, and draws her gun. You feel ice grip your heart, literally and figurativly. Coldness is spreading from your chest, where her Freeze-A-Ton-2000s hit you. Horace shouts as you fall down and slip into unconsciousness, and the last thing you hear is the Cowgirls sneering voice.//

[[Continue. ->TeachYou]]
passages.name: OhShitGetShot

passages.text:
That'll teach you, Sweetcheeks.

[[The end. ->GameOverUnconcsiouss]]
passages.name: TeachYou
